report.title: Explore records 3 using indexed locations
report.description: Report designed for the explore records facility in iRecord, with additional parameters. This must be used alongside Explore records 3 mapping if maps are required. This version depends on the Spatial Index Builder module to index the list of locations that users can set in their preferences as their locality, for significantly improved performance. It also defaults to recent records only.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf on onf.id=o.id JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=o.sample_id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id LEFT JOIN index_websites_website_agreements canEdit on canEdit.from_website_id=o.website_id and canEdit.to_website_id in (#website_ids#) and canEdit.provide_for_editing=true #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND ('#record_status#'<>'' OR (o.record_status not in ('I','T') AND (#ownData#=1 OR o.record_status not in ('D','R')))) #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence IDs to filter to.

param.name: currentUser
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: location_id
param.description: Provide the location to display records for

param.name: taxon_groups
param.description: List of taxon group IDs to view data for

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: date_from
param.where: ('#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: date_to
param.where: ('#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: user_filter
param.description: Use this to filter the list to a warehouse user ID other than the current user

param.name: default_input_form
param.description: Input form path to use when no other available. Can be used to generate the path in report_grid action links.

param.name: force_default_input_form
param.description: Force the defaault input form to be used instead of the one specified by the record

column.name: taxon
column.sql: CASE WHEN cttl.preferred_taxon=cttl.default_common_name then cttl.preferred_taxon ELSE cttl.preferred_taxon || COALESCE(' | ' || cttl.default_common_name, '') END

column.name: recorder
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.website_id IN (#website_ids#) THEN '' ELSE snf.website_title || '-> ' END || CASE WHEN (TRIM(snf.recorders) !~ ' ' AND LENGTH(snf.recorders)>30) THEN 'Recorder' ELSE snf.recorders END

column.name: belongs_to_user
column.sql: CASE WHEN CAST(o.created_by_id AS character varying) = '#currentUser#' AND o.website_id IN (#website_ids#) THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: input_form
column.sql: case when canEdit.id is null then null when o.input_form is null or o.website_id not in (#website_ids#) or #force_default_input_form#=1 then '#default_input_form#' else o.input_form end
